title: Miley Cyrus hugs Dakota Johnson as Cody Simpson reveals his crush
text:
She was recently seen packing on the PDA with longtime friend Cody Simpson on Thursday.

And Miley Cyrus proved once again that she has no issues getting physical with a friend.

The 26-year-old singer was spotted giving Dakota Johnson a loving embrace at her star-studded 30th birthday party in Los Malibu on Sunday.

Aww: Miley Cyrus: was spotted giving Dakota Johnson a loving embrace at her star-studded 30th birthday party in Los Malibu on Sunday

'Miley Cyrus has always been my childhood celebrity crush. I knew all the words to her songs, I'm not going to lie': The outing comes amid the revelation that Miley's new love interest Cody has had a crush on her for over seven years in this uncovered Fuse interview from 2012

The outing comes amid the revelation that Miley's new love interest Cody has had a crush on her for over seven years.

'Miley Cyrus has always been my childhood celebrity crush. I knew all the words to her songs, I'm not going to lie,' Cody admitted in an interview for Fuse in 2012 when he was just 15-years-old.

Cody, now 22, continued: 'I'm not ashamed about it. I was a big Miley Cyrus fan. I think she will be forever the most dateable Disney star.'

Happy to be there: The 26-year-old singer was not joined by Cody at the birthday but that didn't seem to stop Miley from having a good time

Simply stunning: Dakota looked gorgeous in a white jumpsuit with strappy black heels

Good times: No doubt the two friends enjoyed catching up with one another

Support system: Dakota's boyfriend Chris Martin, 42, lovingly placed his hand on the small of her back

Sweet: Dakota then wrapped her arm around her back to hold hands with Chris

They went on to build a close friendship in 2015, after collaborating on a charity project together, before things turned romantic earlier this month.

Cody was not in attendance at Dakota's party, however, but that didn't seem to stop Miley from having a good time.

The Party In The USA hitmaker greeted the 50 Shades Of Grey star with a warm hug.

Chill: She was dressed for comfort in a beige knit cardigan over plain white T-shirt

Vibes: Miley also sported a pair of clinging skinny indigo-washed jeans with brown leather thigh-high boots and a matching belt with a large silver buckle

Hanging out: Miley seemed to be quite the social butterfly as she embraced a fellow guest

No doubt the two were more than happy to be catching up as Dakota's boyfriend Chris Martin, 42, lovingly placed his hand on the small of her back.

She was dressed for comfort in a beige knit cardigan over plain white T-shirt.

Miley also sported a pair of clinging skinny indigo-washed jeans with brown leather thigh-high boots and a matching belt with a large silver buckle.

Her blonde tresses were worn down as her bangs ended just above her eye.

New love: She has a new romantic interest in her life in the form of longtime friend Cody

She sported natural, complementary make-up to showcase her stunning looks.

It was a star-studded affair as Gwyneth Paltrow, Kate Hudson, Danny Fujikawa, Robert Downey Jr., Melanie Griffith and Sean Penn were all guests at the party.

The outing came just days after she addressed the make-out session with Cody while revealing how difficult it is for her to date in the public eye.

In the Stories section of her Instagram account, the talented Wrecking Ball singer, showed some love for Simpson with some topless screenshots of the Aussie singer along with two screens filled with a message pertaining to her personal life.

Speaking her truth: On Friday, Miley took to social media to express herself about how she's portrayed in the media, and her new relationship with Simpson; the pair seen here in Miley's Instagram post from 2015

For one of the topless shots of Cody, Miley captioned in the form of a checklist, listing out the hunk's credentials: his age, Australian nationality (which she mentioned is 'my type' surely as a nod to her ex love Liam), and his 'abs'.

'I know the public feels invested in my past relationship [with ex Liam Hemsworth] because they felt like they saw it thru from the beginning,' the star began her longer confessional.

'I think that's why people have always felt so entitled over my life and how I live it because they've watched me grow up.'

'But I am grown now,' Cyrus continued, 'and make choices as an adult knowing the truth/details/reality.' People only "know" what they see on the internet.'

Miley also addressed the inequity of how famous women are portrayed in their pursuit of love and intimacy, as compared to famous men.

'Men (especially successful ones) are RARELY slut shamed. They move on from one beautiful woman to the next MOST times without consequence. They are referred to as "legends", "heart throbs",' she continued, 'where women are called sluts/whores! I am trying to just THRIVE/survive in a "mans" world.'

'If we can't beat em, join em!' Miley concluded the section. 'If our president can "grab em by the p***y..." can't I just have a kiss and acai bowl?!?!'

After specifically responding to being recently spotted kissing Cody, she addressed the budding relationship on the next screen of her Instagram story.

She's into him: For one of the topless shots she posted of Cody, Miley captioned in the form of a checklist, listing out the hunk's credentials

'I refuse to recluse and "date" from home cause A. That's not fun B. Extremely uncomfortable/puts me in a vulnerable position,' the Slide Away performer expressed.

'I would like to share an activity with someone I am dating and not be stuck at home with pretty much nothing to do but "Netflix and chill".

'This "dating" thing is new to me too. I've never been an "adult"/grown a** woman experiencing this... I was in a committed relationship for almost All my teens and early 20s; with the exception of a few breaks, which usually in those times I was working my a** off with not much R&R... and "meeting/trusting" people in my position is really tuff.'

'Don't f***ing pity me, not what I'm asking for,' Miley concluded. 'I have a great life I wouldn't trade for "privacy" but PLEASE don't make this awkward for me! I am trying to make light and like always MAKE FUN of myself/and the public's perception of me! Get used to me dating – this is where I am at!'

Claiming what's hers: Another of Miley's adoring snaps of Cody on her Instagram story on Friday

This isn't the first time the singer has used social media to vent.

Shortly after her split from Liam Hemsworth was made public late this summer, Cyrus made a public statement on Twitter an Instagram that revealed some of her feelings about the split, and how it was important for her to set the record straight.

'At this point I had to make a healthy decision for myself to leave a previous life behind,' she tweeted on August 22.

'I am the healthiest and happiest I have been in a long time. You can say I am a twerking, pot smoking , foul mouthed hillbilly but I am not a liar.'

Setting it straight: This isn't the first time the singer has used social media to vent
